name: NYT Home Ba Dinh
address: 227 Doi Can, Ba Dinh, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Featuring air conditioning, NYT Home Ba Dinh offers accommodation in Hanoi. Giang Vo Exhibition Center is 1.3 km away. Free WiFi is featured .

The accommodation is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. All units have a kitchen fitted with a microwave and fridge. A stovetop and kettle are also available. Free private parking is also available on site. Bed linen is offered.

One Pillar Pagoda is 1.4 km from NYT Home Ba Dinh, while Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum is 1.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 20 km from NYT Home Ba Dinh.
